attributes.action: stop local councils selling off houses and not replenishing their stock.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the local councils have a huge waiting list of people needing bigger properties due to having opposite sex children shareing bedrooms,and not being able to afford mortgages. They seem to be quite happy to let people have the right to buy but they dont have any properties to replace the with, so the list gets longer and by the time you are offered a house your kids have probably left home!
